extDescription.message: Allows the user to keep single cookies stored across sessions when cookies are set to be non-persistent across sessions.

persistentCookies.description: Table title on the options page.

buttonRemove.description: Title of the buttons on the options page that untracks a single cookie.

buttonRemoveAll.description: Title of the button on the options page that untracks all cookies.

tableHeaderDomain.description: Table header for the cookie domain column.

tableHeaderName.description: Table header for the cookie name column.

tableHeaderValue.description: Table header for the cookie value column.

tableHeaderAddRemove.description: Table header for the add/remove column.
